channel.title: ::zone command

item.title: ::zone command
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

try this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zone")) {
    if (playerRights >= 1) {
        teleportToX = 3551;
        teleportToY = 9694;
        heightLevel = 0;
    }
    else
        sM("you dont have rights to use this command");
}

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Pulmonary, post:2, topic:284138”][code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“zone”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
teleportToX = 3551;
teleportToY = 9694;
heightLevel = 0;
}else{

     sM("you dont have rights to use this command");

} [/code]

If that doesnt work try this:

[code]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“zone”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
toX = 3551;
toY = 9694;
heightLevel = 0;
}else{

     sM("you dont have rights to use this command");

}
[/code][/quote]
